description: Copy number variations in the region 16p13.11 (exact position: chr16:15511655-16293689 (GRCh37), are rare, pathological mutations in the human genome. It is a risk variation for neuropsychiatric diseases like schizophrenia (Kirov et al. 2014, 10.1016/j.biopsych.2013.07.022)
title: 16p13.11 copy number variation syndrome
